name: Rayc Ryjerd (V)
Lore: 'An ''honest'' smuggler. Working for Jabba to pay off debts for his ship. Rycar''s son. Even more of an idiot.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Twice per game, may take one Big One, Kessel Run, or Rycar''s Run into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Once per game, may double the value of X for Kessel Run or Rycar''s Run. Rayc is a matching pilot for any freighter or yacht.',
